participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and determined; always looking for new challenges and experiences.
participant_1.background: i am a stunt double as my second job. i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life.

participant_2.name: Lena
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic; enjoys trying new foods and meeting new people.
participant_2.background: i am not a good swimmer at all. i love rollercoasters and sky diving. hello i just moved here from germany. i am a vegan and i love hummus.

content.text: hi, how are you today? i am doing well.
